title: How to get paid fairly
excerpt: "We have projects starting at $2,000. We bring tremendous value to the table for every project we work on. If you’re looking for anything less than that, we are not going to be a good fit. Thanks for

children.text: "We have projects starting at $2,000. We bring tremendous value to the table for every project we work on. If you’re looking for anything less than that, we are not going to be a good fit. Thanks for understanding and good luck!”
what you’re worth and (respectfully) turn away clients not worth your time.
